Summary Note:
Friis Jespersen Lykke and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Copenhagen. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Friis Jespersen Lykke is a 46 year old and comes from Denmark.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Friis Jespersen Lykke is currently widowed. His children are named Olsen, Alberte and Madsen.
Education Background:
In 1997, Friis graduated from Struer Statsgymnasium with a secondary school diploma.
In 2003, Friis graduated from University of Southern Denmark with a degree.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 22 years, Friis Jespersen Lykke has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Friis Jespersen Lykke's first role was as a Ship Broker at A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S, where he worked diligently from 2003 to 2006 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Shipping Company Owner at A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S in 2008, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 2490000 DKK, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns villa in Næstved, where he resides. It is worth 2030000 DKK.

He purchased villa in Århus N, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2280000 DKK.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful condo in Hillerød, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1420000 DKK.
He inherited a significant sum of 32440000 DKK from his grandmother, a respected Investment Banker, in 2005, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Friis as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
